page.title: 07POLITICAL VIEWS
page.content: There are few voters in our area,as much of it is farmland.However,some potential voters were questioned as to their view.{100%}said they would vote in general elections.{70%}said they would vote in local or European elections,{30%}said they would not.{ {90%}said they always voted for the same party,{10%}said they did not.{60% said they did agree with pressure groups ({80%}no Stansted Airport,{20%} conservationists,{20%}C.N.D.),{40%} said they didn't know. The local Member of Parliament is Bowen Wells of the Conservative Party.
